Html: I've got 2 pieces of Frostfire Garb on (10 man shoulders and legs), but I don't get the set bonus.  I've updated the items. I'm using Rawr 2.1.2.
Update the items from Wowhead, and make sure you unequip and reequip the items. You probably have the armory version which is missing sets. If that fails, just set the items' Set Name in the editor.
